item.description:
Note: This event requires a reservation and it may or may not require a deposit by the organizer so all cancellations within 48 hours of the event requires a reason. Please do not sign up unless you are sure that you can make it.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The membership has voted! The October Restaurant of the month is Thousand Crane.

About the Restaurant of the Month:

We were disappointed when Jasmine Palace left downtown Nashua. Its design was modern and inviting, and the food and prices were appetizing. Fortunately, Thousand Crane II has moved into the spot, and West Pearl Street once again has a nice, upscale Asian restaurant.

We were happy to see that the interior didn't change much at all. It still has the cool, mint-colored walls, illuminated bar and attractive Asian artwork on the wall.

http://www.nashuatele...

Menu:

http://thousandcraner...
item.how_to_find_us: I will have a meetup sign.
item.name: FAN Restaurant of the Month
